p: Using the filtering criteria of fold change > 2 and p-value < 0.05, 206 genes with differential m6A methylation genes in MH7A cells were identified after stimulation with TNF-Î±, of which 118 m6A hypermethylated genes and 88 m6A hypomethylated genes were identified ( Figure 3A and B). The top 10 hypermethylated genes and the top 10 hypomethylated genes are shown in Table 1.
